name: Upload ST
Download ST
get message # then data
Acom 600S Status and Control
info:
Amplifier (ACOM 600S) status message sent automatically and continuously with 10 ms pause through the amps RS232 interface.  Message rate to N-R slowed for convenience and stability. Data extracted from message includes amp mode(OPR/STBY), amp SWR, amp TEMP and amp FWD PWR, at this time. 

ACOM amp must be directed to "Start Telementry" to begin sending primary status message, 0x2F.  This should be incorporated into a system start-up flow but is not included here as it is specific to the user's equipment.

No Dashboard has been created for this flow as all my amplifier interface will be using a Streamdeck 15 key controller. Pushbutton command from Streamdeck (SD) is used to change amplifier modes.   Dashboard may be created at a later date.

name: ABOUT
info:
Flow to collect/send data from/to an ACOM 600S Linear Amplifier.  Specifics are based on ACOM publication, “RF Amplifier ACOM 600S Serial Port Communication Protocol” rev.1.1, dated 12-4-2014 by Nikolay Nenov.  Use for other similar ACOM products has not been investigated.
By George Jones, K7GRJ
October 2022

name: << Start telemetry must be triggered after startup of amp
